input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Poverty has a direct effect on water quality and cholera. Water company has a direct effect on water quality. Water quality has a direct effect on cholera. Poverty is unobserved. We know that high poverty and global water company causes clean water. high poverty and clean water causes cholera contraction. We observed the person is served by a local water company and the region has low poverty. Would the person avoids cholera if polluted water instead of clean water?
